name: Atlantic Flight Training Limited
about: Atlantic Flight Training Academy (AFTA) is a renowned EASA-approved international flight training organisation based at Cork International Airport, Ireland, with satellite bases at Waterford and Shannon airports. Established in 1995 by Captain Mark Casey, AFTA specializes in integrated and modular training programs, including the prestigious Ryanair Mentored Programme. With over 29 years of experience, AFTA has trained over 2,300 pilots now employed by leading airlines worldwide. The academy boasts a modern fleet of aircraft, including Cessna 172s, Diamond DA42 Twin Stars, and Piper PA34 Senecas, along with advanced simulators. AFTA is committed to delivering high-standard training, ensuring students are competent, confident, and professional pilots, ready for careers with top airlines.
